entry.def: If you say that something is done royally, you are emphasizing that it is done in an impressive or grand way, or that it is very great in degree.

example.ex: They were royally received in every aspect...
example.tran: 不论从哪个方面来说，他们都受到了隆重的接待。

example.ex: They then get royally drunk in his memory.
example.tran: 他记得他们后来喝得烂醉。
